origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'DidiTechAPI.get_tech_investment', 'description': 'This function retrieves the technology investment data for a specified company over a given number of years, focusing on a specific technology category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., 滴滴出行.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific technology category, e.g., 出行技术.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investmentData', 'description': 'The detailed investment data for the specified company, years, and technology category.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 DidiTechAPI.get_tech_investment, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'滴滴出行', 'years'是'5', 'category'是'出行技术'.
